page.title: 17AIRPORT HOTEL ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
The St. George Hotel offers various entertainments for both guests and visiting people from the surrounding area.
There is a games room with facilities for darts , dominoes, pool and electronic video games. Special arrangements have been made for guests to use the local Tennis Centre and golf course. A more relaxing time could be spent in the hotel's sauna or solarium.
Regular dinner-dances are held on weekend evenings , along with occasional summer barbecues."Sixties Nights", featuring popular music of the 1960's and performances by a local brass band are also well attended.
